name: Reddit Web 2.0 - Fluid Layout
description:
A modification of "Reddit web 2.0 but even more pretty" with the inclusion of styling of visited links and a hover effect and conversion to a fluid (non-fixed) layout.

Based on the style created by joeally and by eightfivezero.

http://userstyles.org/styles/33879
http://userstyles.org/styles/33832
